alias g="git"
alias b="build.py"
alias m="build.py -m"
alias j.root="cd ${DETECTIVE_CONAN_ROOT}/"
alias j.build="cd ${DETECTIVE_CONAN_ROOT}/build/"
alias j.dev="cd ${DETECTIVE_CONAN_ROOT}/dev/"
alias j.bin="cd ${DETECTIVE_CONAN_ROOT}/dev/bin/"
alias j.env="cd ${DETECTIVE_CONAN_ROOT}/dev/env/"
alias j.test="cd ${DETECTIVE_CONAN_ROOT}/dev/test/"
